title: Epic Skins for Rune Pages - How do you know what you got?
body: I had 9 rune pages before the announcement.  I bought the rune page bundle.  So, do I get skins or no?

replies.body: You have to play a game. A mission pops up for 'play a matchmade game' for whatever rewards you can get. I had one for two skins and another for a Death Sworn icon, and I got all of it after the first game.

> [{quoted}](name=Spiffy McBang,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8tnj5J4x,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-08T18:14:28.294+0000)
>
> You have to play a game. A mission pops up for 'play a matchmade game' for whatever rewards you can get. I had one for two skins and another for a Death Sworn icon, and I got all of it after the first game.

Ah Okay you're right.  I played a game and then a bunch of stuff appeared, including the skins.  Thanks!
I have not got mine either i have 9 rune pages
I only got one skin after the missions. I feel left out when all my buddies get their epic skins and I am stuck with an yasuo skin...
i had like 16 pages or something from along time ago, i think i also bought the bundle, but the mission for the rune page skins never popped up, even though i played a couple games
IKR i did'nt get them either i dont know whats wrong
My epic skin appeared on the home page with a mystery skin icon that said "Claim". You should get 3 skins for 9 pages, IIRC
